title: Die Lose Streak Hat Begonnen
body: Tja, nachdem ich (dachte) dass ich nicht mehr in diese Troll Teams reinkomme, hat somit mein Win-Streak ein ende und ich bekomme wieder extremst schlechte Teams. 2 Spiele verloren, nun einmal ist mein Toplaner afk gegangen nachdem er gefeedet hat. Im andern game war ich gezwungen Supp zu spielen und meine Midlane/Toplane/Jungler waren grauenhaft und haben garnichts gemacht, wieder nen hardcore lose. Tja Leute, es sieht so aus, als würd ich wieder dauernd in diese AFK/Noob teams reingesteckt, damit ich nicht climben kann, man hält mich für verrückt aber ich bin mir sehr sicher, dass man absichtlich versucht mich auf low rating zu halten, damit das rating gleichgewicht nicht auseinander bricht haltet man künstlich leute auf lowem rating, indem man sie eben mit solchen teams trollt, haltet mich für verrückt aber es ist wirklich so.

replies.body:
Ich kopier einfach mal einen Post, den ich vor kurzem zu exakt dem selben Thema geschrieben habe: 

> But, lets use logic again. Lets assume you are right, lets assume that Riot does intentionally end streaks by forcing good/bad teammates on players. If that's the case, answer me this: Why? Why in gods name would Riot do that? How do they profit from it? How is it in Riots interest to intentionally ruin players games and %%%%ing up the ranked system intentionally, just to end streaks?
In order to do that they would have to lie to players for years and they could be busted by anyone with API access (i.e. pretty much everyone) at any time. So they would be lying to the community with the constant very likely risk to be caught...and all that to intentionally ruin the game for players? Why? WHY?
And that's not even all of it. Why would they go through all this effort, just to create a system that has the exact same result as simply leaving it up to statistics/coincidence?
Riot doesn't only have no interest in ending streaks, they also don't have to because streaks end by themselves. Why create a secret system and lie to players if just NOT doing that has the exact same results?
Every time you win a game your MMR increases, resulting in better teammates and enemies. So if you win a lot of games in a row, you are matched with players that are a lot better than you, making it more and more likely that you will lose the game. The same (but opposite) applies to lose streaks. So streaks end themselves, there is simply no need to end streaks artifically. And, sorry for repeating myself: Riot doesn't have an interest in ending streaks. Why would they?

> In other words: The conspiracy you see doesn't exist. It would make no sense.
